price: 47.Usuk kas mabeyaay, amó berra mali kaadu usun kaat mayaskiran (madoomitan).
arabic: لَا فِيهَا غَوۡلٞ وَلَا هُمۡ عَنۡهَا يُنزَفُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: lā fīhā ghawlun walā hum ʿanhā yunzafūna
